attributes.title: Glitchy
attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was met with the reality that upon opening it all it does is crash and glitch. Not only that but when it did open it would just give me a blank white screen. I’ve never had such an awful experience with an app.

attributes.title: Hey 🤚🏼it’s Hannah 😔.Hannah baker 🤫
attributes.review:
this app is very scary and needs to be removed! i opened the app and it told me if i didnt give them my personal info they would send the cheeto man 🥺🧚🏽‍♀️🥰✨ i gave it to them and he still came! i ran into my bathroom and twisted my ankle calf knee and now i need to go to the hospital ✨🧚🏽‍♀️👑🥰💗 if this app has my info, so can tiktok
#blm #savetiktok2020 #savebarron2020

this app took eons to download when I downloaded it I kept having a bunch of porn ads pop up my phone very disgusting and disturbing I absolutely do not recommend this app and I’m really really confused why they have a straight up Chito on the front page when you open the app

attributes.title: it made my phone crash
attributes.review: this app has made my phone crash CONSTANTLY! i never had any issues before i downloaded this. also, his plans for the 2020 election? i will definitely NOT be voting for him. i recommend they fix the bugs and also fix this awful campaign.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app took 10 tries to download and when it finally downloaded I was forced to look at a Cheeto puff asking for my phone number I would not recommend this app instead I would recommend watching the news from a non biased channel still looking for one myself 🥰.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING.
attributes.review: I honestly never thought I would be so disgusted and disappointed. I downloaded the app because I was bored, but when it opened up it showed me a horrible image of a Cheeto. It was traumatic. I’m going to have nightmares for a long time. The app itself was glitchy. It gave false information about Trump. I was very uncomfortable. Dishonored Cheeto puff.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP CRASHES YOUR PHONE
attributes.review: This app is so bad! It took 3 months to download, and when it finally did it crashed! I do not recommend unless you want to put yourself at risk because it steals your information and sells it on the web. Even if you get it to work, it’s filled with racist and communism views. Don’t get it it’s awful!!!!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have ever downloaded. I think it made my phone glitch out because after I downloaded it, my phone would turn off randomly and the battery stopped running. It definitely had a virus and I am ashamed that our president would allow this.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is horrible. I was just trying to support the president, but when I downloaded it, my phone started glitching. It keeps closing out of other apps and it won’t let me google anything related to Black Lives Matter or women’s rights. I deleted it immediately and it fixed the problem.

attributes.title: We have an idiot for president
attributes.review:
WOW! This app is so slow and old, unbelievable hard to believe this things could run an entire country. It constantly keeps telling lies, false information, and ruining our country! One star, completely needs to go away... FOREVER!!!
Im starting to think his supporters are inbred, they got an Aunt-Mom, Brother-Dad.
